attributes.action: call an immediate General election, so that the British Electorate can decide whether our MPs are still worthy of a seat in the House of Commons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the outrageous and dishonest expenses claims of some MPs, the people should be given the opportunity to decide whether their MP is still entitled to represent them in Parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
